tooltip.en: Flight time affects shooting quality and planning flexibility. Short flights (15-20 min) are sufficient for hobby, long projects (30+ min) are necessary for professional work. tooltip.en: Screen size directly impacts your tablet usage experience. Larger screens are better for media consumption and gaming, but may be less practical in terms of portability. Smaller screens are more portable but offer a less immersive visual experience. Choosing the right size depends on your needs and usage habits. tooltip.en: Processor performance determines how fast and smoothly your tablet will run. More powerful processors allow you to run demanding applications and games more smoothly. However, more powerful processors usually come at a higher price. A mid-range processor may suffice for daily use, while a powerful processor is necessary for intensive tasks such as gaming or video editing. The number of processor cores and clock speed are factors affecting performance.

tooltip.en: RAM determines how efficiently your tablet can run multiple apps simultaneously. More RAM allows you to open and run more apps and improves performance. Storage space is used to store your photos, videos, apps, and files. More storage space allows you to store more content. The size of RAM and storage space affects the tablet's price. 4GB RAM and 64GB storage may be sufficient for general use, while higher values should be preferred for intensive use.

tooltip.en: Battery life determines how long you can use your tablet on a single charge. It varies depending on your daily usage habits. Long battery life is important for heavy use. Longer battery life usually means larger and more expensive batteries. For daily use, 8-10 hours of battery life may be sufficient, while for longer use, you should prefer a tablet with higher battery life.

tooltip.en: Your brand preference affects your expectations regarding the quality, durability, and customer support of your tablet. Some brands may be better in specific features or software updates. You can choose based on your previous experiences or brands you trust. However, brand doesn't always guarantee quality; it's important to pay attention to features as well.

tooltip.en: Screen size directly impacts your workspace and comfort. Smaller screens (24 inches) save desktop space but can make viewing large documents difficult. Larger screens (32 inches or more) offer a more comfortable viewing experience but require more desktop space and can be more expensive. Choosing the right size based on your needs and workspace is crucial.

tooltip.tr: Ã‡Ã¶zÃ¼nÃ¼rlÃ¼k, gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼ netliÄŸini ve ayrÄ±ntÄ± seviyesini belirler.  1080p (Full HD) gÃ¼nlÃ¼k kullanÄ±m iÃ§in yeterlidir, ancak daha bÃ¼yÃ¼k ekranlarda pikseller daha belirgin olabilir. 1440p (QHD) daha net ve detaylÄ± bir gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼ sunar, Ã¶zellikle grafik tasarÄ±m veya fotoÄŸraf dÃ¼zenleme gibi iÅŸlerde fark edilir. 4K ultra yÃ¼ksek Ã§Ã¶zÃ¼nÃ¼rlÃ¼k, en keskin ve detaylÄ± gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼yÃ¼ saÄŸlar, ancak daha yÃ¼ksek fiyatlÄ± monitÃ¶rlerde bulunur.
tooltip.en: Resolution determines image clarity and detail level. 1080p (Full HD) is sufficient for daily use, but pixels may be more noticeable on larger screens. 1440p (QHD) provides a sharper and more detailed image, especially noticeable in tasks like graphic design or photo editing. 4K ultra-high resolution provides the sharpest and most detailed image, but is found in higher-priced monitors.

tooltip.tr: Yenileme hÄ±zÄ±, saniyedeki gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼ sayÄ±sÄ±nÄ± belirler ve oyun performansÄ±nÄ± ve genel akÄ±cÄ±lÄ±ÄŸÄ± etkiler. 60Hz standarttÄ±r, ancak 75Hz veya 144Hz gibi daha yÃ¼ksek yenileme hÄ±zlarÄ±, Ã¶zellikle hÄ±zlÄ± hareketli oyunlarda daha akÄ±cÄ± bir gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼ saÄŸlar.  Daha yÃ¼ksek yenileme hÄ±zlarÄ± daha pahalÄ±dÄ±r, ancak daha pÃ¼rÃ¼zsÃ¼z bir deneyim sunar.
tooltip.en: Refresh rate determines the number of frames per second and affects gaming performance and overall smoothness. 60Hz is standard, but higher refresh rates like 75Hz or 144Hz provide a smoother image, especially in fast-paced games. Higher refresh rates are more expensive but offer a smoother experience.

label.tr: Panel tipi (IPS, VA, TN) ne kadar Ã¶nemli?
label.en: How important is panel type (IPS, VA, TN)?

tooltip.tr: Panel tipi, renk doÄŸruluÄŸu, gÃ¶rÃ¼ntÃ¼ aÃ§Ä±larÄ± ve tepki sÃ¼relerini etkiler. IPS paneller en iyi renk doÄŸruluÄŸunu ve geniÅŸ gÃ¶rÃ¼ÅŸ aÃ§Ä±larÄ±nÄ± sunar, ancak daha pahalÄ±dÄ±r. VA paneller iyi renk doÄŸruluÄŸu ve yÃ¼ksek kontrast oranlarÄ± sunar. TN paneller en uygun fiyatlÄ±dÄ±r, ancak renk doÄŸruluÄŸu ve gÃ¶rÃ¼ÅŸ aÃ§Ä±larÄ± daha sÄ±nÄ±rlÄ±dÄ±r.  KullanÄ±m amacÄ±nÄ±za gÃ¶re uygun panel tipini seÃ§mek Ã¶nemlidir.
tooltip.en: Panel type affects color accuracy, viewing angles, and response times. IPS panels offer the best color accuracy and wide viewing angles but are more expensive. VA panels offer good color accuracy and high contrast ratios. TN panels are the most affordable but have more limited color accuracy and viewing angles. Choosing the right panel type based on your usage is important.

label.en: Do you have a brand preference?

tooltip.tr: BazÄ± markalar belirli teknolojilerde veya mÃ¼ÅŸteri hizmetlerinde daha iyi olabilir. Daha Ã¶nce kullandÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ±z veya gÃ¼vendiÄŸiniz bir marka varsa, bu tercihinizi etkileyebilir.  Ancak, fiyat ve Ã¶zelliklere odaklanarak en iyi seÃ§imi yapabilirsiniz.
tooltip.en: Some brands may be better in specific technologies or customer service. If you have used or trust a specific brand before, this may influence your preference. However, you can make the best choice by focusing on price and features.

tooltip.tr: SensÃ¶r, fare hassasiyetini belirler. Optik sensÃ¶rler daha yaygÄ±n, lazer sensÃ¶rler yÃ¼ksek hassasiyet gerektiren iÅŸler iÃ§in daha uygundur.  DPI (Dots Per Inch) deÄŸeri yÃ¼ksek olan sensÃ¶rler daha hassastÄ±r. Oyun iÃ§in yÃ¼ksek DPI, genel kullanÄ±m iÃ§in orta seviye DPI yeterlidir. Lazer sensÃ¶rler genellikle daha pahalÄ±dÄ±r.
tooltip.en: The sensor determines mouse sensitivity. Optical sensors are more common, laser sensors are better suited for tasks requiring high precision.  DPI (Dots Per Inch) is a measure of sensitivity. High DPI is good for gaming, medium DPI is sufficient for general use. Laser sensors are usually more expensive.

tooltip.tr: Kablosuz fareler masaÃ¼stÃ¼ dÃ¼zenini temiz tutar ve kablo karmaÅŸasÄ±nÄ± Ã¶nler. Ancak pil Ã¶mrÃ¼ ve gecikme sÃ¼resi gÃ¶z Ã¶nÃ¼nde bulundurulmalÄ±dÄ±r. Kablolu fareler daha gÃ¼venilir ve dÃ¼ÅŸÃ¼k gecikme sÃ¼resi sunar, ancak hareket Ã¶zgÃ¼rlÃ¼ÄŸÃ¼nÃ¼ kÄ±sÄ±tlar. Kablosuz fareler genellikle daha pahalÄ±dÄ±r.
tooltip.en: Wireless mice keep the desktop tidy and prevent cable clutter. However, battery life and latency should be considered. Wired mice are more reliable and offer low latency, but limit freedom of movement. Wireless mice are usually more expensive.

tooltip.tr: Ergonomik tasarÄ±m, uzun sÃ¼reli kullanÄ±mda bile el yorgunluÄŸunu azaltÄ±r.  Ã–zellikle avuÃ§ iÃ§i boyutu ve el kavrama ÅŸekline uygun bir fare seÃ§mek Ã¶nemlidir.  Ergonomik fareler genellikle daha yÃ¼ksek fiyatlÄ±dÄ±r ancak saÄŸlÄ±k ve konfor aÃ§Ä±sÄ±ndan uzun vadede fayda saÄŸlar.
tooltip.en: Ergonomic design reduces hand fatigue even with prolonged use. Choosing a mouse that suits your palm size and grip style is important. Ergonomic mice are usually more expensive but provide long-term benefits in terms of health and comfort.

label.tr: Ekstra tuÅŸlar ve Ã¶zellikler Ã¶nemli mi?
label.en: Are extra buttons and features important?

tooltip.tr: Ekstra tuÅŸlar, Ã¶zelleÅŸtirilebilir DPI ayarlarÄ±, programlanabilir makro desteÄŸi gibi Ã¶zellikler, verimliliÄŸi artÄ±rabilir ve iÅŸ akÄ±ÅŸÄ±nÄ±zÄ± hÄ±zlandÄ±rabilir. Ã–zellikle oyun veya grafik tasarÄ±m gibi alanlarda faydalÄ±dÄ±r. Ancak, bu Ã¶zellikler fiyatÄ± artÄ±rÄ±r. Ä°htiyacÄ±nÄ±za gÃ¶re deÄŸerlendirin.
tooltip.en: Extra buttons, customizable DPI settings, programmable macro support, and other features can increase efficiency and speed up your workflow. Particularly useful in gaming or graphic design. However, these features increase the price. Consider your needs.

label.en: Yes, I want many extra features
Yes, a few extra features are enough
No, I don't need extra features
Do you have a brand preference?

tooltip.tr: BazÄ± markalar belirli Ã¶zelliklerde veya dayanÄ±klÄ±lÄ±kta daha iyi olabilir.  Ã–rneÄŸin Logitech, Corsair ve Razer oyun farelerinde popÃ¼ler markalardÄ±r.  Daha Ã¶nce kullandÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ±z ve memnun kaldÄ±ÄŸÄ±nÄ±z bir marka varsa onu tercih edebilirsiniz. Ancak, markalar genellikle fiyatlandÄ±rmada farklÄ±lÄ±k gÃ¶sterir.
tooltip.en: Some brands may be better in certain features or durability. For example, Logitech, Corsair, and Razer are popular brands for gaming mice. If you have previously used and been satisfied with a brand, you can prefer it. However, brands often differ in pricing.
